Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute at 20th/State
ShortDescription: 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Archer, Clark, Cermak and State due to, street blockage near 20th/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via State, Archer, Clark, Cermak and State due to, street blockage near 20th/State.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at 20th/State
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 18th, Clark and Archer due to, street blockage near 20th/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via State, 18th, Clark and Archer due to, street blockage near 20th/State.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Pulaski.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
